title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 262 - Granting Of Time Allowances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 262 - Granting Of Time Allowances

State Regulations
§ 262.1 - Procedure for granting good behavior allowances
§ 262.2 to 262.3 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 262

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§112, 137, 803

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
